We are aware of transient problems in the DeadlockDetector.  Max is working on a
fix.

Created an attachment (id=7005)
Proposed patch to deadlock detection

The patch is against the org.eclipse.runtime.jobs.internal package

Created an attachment (id=7006)
More tests for deadlock detection

The patch is against the org.eclipse.core.tests.runtime.jobs package

Max, I'm unable to merge this patch because of all the equinox merge changes. 
Can you attach a new patch?

The patch is against the org.eclipse.core.runtime plugin

The patch is against the org.eclipse.core.tests.runtime plugin

That scared me, because we released a fix for this bug last week.  The stack
trace in comment #12 is completely different from the one at the start of this
bug report.  I have entered (and fixed) bug 48412 for Tod's stack trace.
